com.epoch.chem.chemConstants

Interface ChemConstants

  • All Superinterfaces:
    FormatConstants
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    CountMetalsConstants, LewisConstants, MechConstants, MechErrorConstants, MechSynthConstants, SynthConstants, SynthPartCreditsConstants, WtConstants
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ChemUtils, Contains, CountMetals, ElectronMatcher, FnalGroup, Formula, FormulaFunctions, FormulaWeight, LewisMolecule, LewisOuterNumber, Mechanism, MechArrow, MechError, MechFlow, MechFlowsValid, MechInitiation, MechParser, MechProdStartIs, MechProdStartProps, MechRule, MechRuleFunctions, MechSet, MechShape, MechSolver, MechStage, MechSubstructSearch, MechSubstructure, MechUtils, MechValidFlows, MolCompare, MolString, NamedCompound, Normalize, pKaFunctions, Question, ResponseConstants, RxnCondition, SingleRxnConstants, SixMembRing, StereoFunctions, SynthBadSMs, SynthDataConstants, SynthEquals, SynthError, Synthesis, SynthMenuOnlyRgts, SynthOneRxn, SynthParser, SynthPartCredits, SynthScheme, SynthSelective, SynthSet, SynthSolver, SynthStage, SynthStarterRule, SynthUtils, Weight

    public interface ChemConstants
extends FormatConstants
    Holds constants used in chemical calculation methods.
